docs.snippet: The Republic of Uruguay will announce today a formal offer to holders of its dollar bonds to exchange them for new readjustment bonds carrying generally higher rates of interest than the 3 1/2 per cent rate now being paid and providing for...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republic of Uruguay will announce today a formal offer to holders of its dollar bonds to exchange them for new readjustment bonds carrying generally higher rates of interest than the 3 1/2 per cent rate now being paid and providing for substantial sinking funds to retire the new securities.
docs.abstract: Offers bond exch; higher interest rates offered

headline.main: URUGUAY OFFERS A BOND EXCHANGE; Would Give New Readjustment Securities With Higher Rates in General

docs.snippet: The Maritime Commission, intervening for a second time in ten days in strikes on governmentowned ships, warned the crew of the America France Line freighter Vincent last evening that if they did not immediately end a sit-down strike and take their...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Maritime Commission, intervening for a second time in ten days in strikes on governmentowned ships, warned the crew of the America France Line freighter Vincent last evening that if they did not immediately end a sit-down strike and take their ship to sea their licenses as seamen would be imperiled.
docs.abstract: Maritime Comm warning it will not tolerate strike on govt-owned ships ends sit-down on freighter Vincent; NMU protests to Commerce Dept on interference in strikes by Bur of Marine Inspection and Navigation

headline.main: FEDERAL WARNING ENDS SHIP STRIKE; Maritime Commission Threat to Cancel Licenses Sends Crew Back to Work

docs.snippet: The New York Stock Exchange has authorized the listing of 500,000 shares of E. I. duPont de Nemours  Co. $4.50 cumulative preferred stock, no-par value; 436,363 additional shares of Bethlehem Steel Corporation common stock, no-par value; 399,999...
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Stock Exchange has authorized the listing of 500,000 shares of E. I. duPont de Nemours Co. $4.50 cumulative preferred stock, no-par value; 436,363 additional shares of Bethlehem Steel Corporation common stock, no-par value; 399,999 additional shares of Cutler-Hammer, Inc., common stock, no-par value, and $3,500,000 of Liquid Carbonic Corporation tenyear 4 per cent convertible sinking fund debentures, due in 1947.
docs.abstract: N Y Stock Exch authorizes debenture listing

headline.main: STOCK EXCHANGE LISTINGS; 500,000 Shares of du Pont $4.50 Preferred to Be Admitted

docs.snippet: Foreign trade of the United States in July increased over July, 1936, in respect to all geographical grand divisions and almost all fifty-one countries listed by the Department of Commerce, an analysis made public today disclosed.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign trade of the United States in July increased over July, 1936, in respect to all geographical grand divisions and almost all fifty-one countries listed by the Department of Commerce, an analysis made public today disclosed.

headline.main: EXPORTS FOR JULY GAIN 49 PER CENT; Increase in Imports Over 1936 Put at 36%, With the Trade Growth Well Divided ONLY FIVE LANDS BUY LESS Seven of Fifty-one Countries, Including Spain and Norway, Send Smaller Amounts
